TopicTitle: Does Kronal vessel viewer work in 1.0.5?

Articles.Content:
It hasn't been updated that's why I ask before I download. I have had a run of bad luck with mods lately so I want to know before I pull the trigger. Thanks in advance!

Also what about orbital decay? Does that mod work in 1.0.5? Edited November 22, 2015 by Berlin
Additional question
Just try them, it won't take much of time :)
It works mate. I use it. I don't know about orbital decay mod though, I didn't even know there was one. Sounds cool though.
Mod question moved to the mod subforum.
I've been trying to use it with 1.0.5 but all I see in preview is a image of a parts texture .DDS or my flag.
